attributes.action: Support mature students with financial help towards college fees and health care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see mature students getting help with college fees and medical care.As a 23 year old part time college student,who works 14 hours a week at minimum wage, i am really struggling with money.i have to live with my parents, and rely on them to pay for my health care such as dentist fees and prescriptions as i have no money! how can people be expected to learn and train for better jobs if no support is given?
